dict.acceptation: 诚实的；坦诚的；老实的；辛勤挣得的；

sent.orig: Besides moral personal and feeling honest, traditional honest in essence should be also single-trend responsible one.
sent.trans: 传统诚信从特质上讲是一种道义诚信、人格诚信、情感诚信和绝对义务性诚信。

sent.orig: If you are honest and frank, people may cheat you: Be frank and honest anyway.
sent.trans: 如果你城实率直，人们可能会欺骗你：无论如何，城实率直些！

sent.orig: All I've ever wanted was an honest week's pay for an honest day's work.
sent.trans: 我想要的不过是：认认真真工作一天，就能有实实足足一周的薪水。

sent.orig: Honest wages for an honest day's work.
sent.trans: 诚实的律师；诚实的报告；正当的工资；公正的砝码。

sent.orig: The 'h' in 'honest' is not sounded. honest.
